overview: What would you do if you had one night with Pierre Fitch? Would you bend him over a bed in New York City like Turk Melrose and Trystian Sweet? Or would you let him pound your ass in Ft. Lauderdale the way Mario Borfuk did? Or better yet, would you be like Johan Lapointe and take a trip to Montreal to blow his sweet cock? No matter your zip code, you're sure to have fun when you spend One Night With Pierre.
title: One Night with Pierre Fitch
